A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the most incoherent of the Star Wars movies\, with possible exception of Lucas's meandering meaningless plot lines over a decade ago. Really thought the last two installments\, out of Lucas's hands\, were very good and tightly written with compelling stories. I had new hope.  There are so many plot failures in this\, it just gives me a headache thinking about them.
